summary: A Paris troupe puts on outlandish performances for a celebrated eighteenth-century British actor in order to convince him of their talents; the arrival of a countess complicates the plot.

keywords: screwball comedy|character name as title|three word title|david garrick character|comedie francaise
title: The Great Garrick
